summary: This is an email chain from June 28-29, 2020, where an individual forwards a defamation complaint (Roberts Defamation_Complaint.pdf) to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York. The email discusses swapping pictures in a PowerPoint presentation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.role: Recipient of email with defamation complaint
persons.context: The email containing the defamation complaint and discussion about PowerPoint pictures is addressed to this person.

events.title: Email exchange about PowerPoint pictures
events.description: An email exchange occurs discussing swapping pictures in a PowerPoint presentation, with the pictures being of the same subjects.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

events.title: Defamation complaint forwarded
events.description: An individual forwards a defamation complaint (Roberts Defamation_Complaint.pdf) to an Assistant United States Attorney.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: A defamation complaint titled 'Roberts Defamation_Complaint.pdf' was forwarded to an Assistant United States Attorney on June 29, 2020.
The email chain discusses swapping pictures in a PowerPoint presentation, noting the pictures are of the same subjects.
The correspondence involves the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document is part of the Epstein case files (EFTA00014395).
